channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 10:32 Air alert in Chernivtsi region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 🔴 10:32 Air alert in Chernivtsi region. Follow for further updates. #Chernivtsi_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
